articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends New Year Cards to Foreign Party and State Leaders
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends New Year Cards to Foreign Party and State Leaders
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent New Year cards to foreign party and state leaders on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 103 (2014).
					 They included the president of the People's Republic of China who is general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, president of the Russian Federation, president of Nepal, president of Laos who is general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, president of Lebanon, president of Mongolia, emir of Kuwait, chief of the Palestinian National Authority who is president of Palestine and chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization, president of Tajikistan, president of Turkmenistan, president of Armenia, king of Jordan, president of Indonesia, president of Yemen, president of Vietnam, captains regent of San Marino, president of  Guinea, president of Namibia, president of Rwanda, president of Mali, president of Algeria, president of Uganda, president of Egypt and the president of Ethiopia.
					
					 Kim Jong Un also sent New Year cards to the prime minister of India, co-chairman of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, UN secretary general and the governor of the Khabarovsk Territory Administration of Russia.

articles.title: Senior Officials Visit Quarters of Participants in Meeting of Sub-workteam Heads
articles.content:
Senior Officials Visit Quarters of Participants in Meeting of Sub-workteam Heads
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials Saturday visited the lodging quarters of the participants in the national meeting of sub-workteam heads in the field of agriculture.
					 Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Kwak Pom Gi, Ro Tu Chol, Vice Premiers Ri Chol Man and Ri Mu Yong and officials concerned went there to meet with the participants.
					
					 They congratulated the officials and sub-workteam heads who contributed to consolidating the material and technical foundations in the field of agriculture and increasing grain production by doing farming well as required by the Juche farming methods with the awareness that they are responsible for the granary of the country in the past.
					
					 They called on officials and sub-workteam heads to bring about a turn in agricultural production by holding the torch of innovations and thus fully display the validity and vitality of the theses on socialist rural question in this significant year marking the 50th anniversary of the theses.
					
					 They requested them to remain loyal to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is working heart and soul to settle the food problem for the people, bearing in mind the party's call for keeping up agriculture as a major thrust of the on-going drive for economic construction and the improvement of the people's standard of living.

articles.title: Open Letter of NDC of DPRK Distributed as Official Document of UNSC
articles.content:
Open Letter of NDC of DPRK Distributed as Official Document of UNSC
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- "Let's Turn out as One in Paving a Wide Avenue for Improving the North-South Relations", the open letter sent by the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK to the authorities, various political parties, social organizations and people of various circles of south Korea, was distributed as official document of the UN Security Council S/2014/53 on January 30.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea issued six stamps reflecting supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 Printed on the upper part of some stamps is "Let us raise a fierce wind of making a fresh leap forward on all fronts of building a thriving country filled with confidence in victory!", the militant slogan for this year laid down in the Address. They deal with the main tasks facing agriculture, construction and science and technology, basic industries and all other sectors of the national economy to raise fierce flames of innovations. 
					
					There are also stamps reflecting the tasks to make fresh strides in the construction of culture, including education, and continue to channel great efforts into building up the country's defence capabilities as well as the strong will of the army and people to consolidate the politico-ideological position of the Korean revolution and thus, cement the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks.
					
					With letters "Let us make fresh headway in the national reunification movement this year, true to the behests of the great leader and general!" written on its upper part, a stamp carries the ideas of the Address that call for rejecting foreign forces, holding fast to the standpoint of By Our Nation Itself, making a positive effort to defend national security and peace and establishing a favorable climate for improved relations between the north and the south.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Carrying out Noble Intention of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Carrying out Noble Intention of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday editorially praises leader Kim Jong Il as the benevolent father of the people who dedicated his all to their happiness, regarding it as his motto to believe in them as in Heaven all his life.
					 To respect and love the people was a political idea of Kim Jong Il and served as a starting point of his thinking and practice, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 He made a tireless long journey for field guidance for people's happiness all his life in the spirit of devoted service that one should pluck even a star and bring a flower into bloom even on a rock if this is desired by people.
					
					 It was thanks to him that the Korean people are enjoying an independent and creative life and the DPRK is demonstrating the powerful national power, a centuries-old desire of the people.
					
					 His undying feats help the new century of Juche make vigorous advance.
					
					 His lifetime desire was to glorify the DPRK as a thriving socialist nation of Juche in which national power is strong, everything prospers and people are well off with nothing to be envied.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea is orientating everything to the drive to successfully carry into practice his idea and determination.
					
					 Only when all people make a leap forward, rallied close around the party single-mindedly, will his lifetime desire be realized and the DPRK shed its rays as a dignified and prosperous, thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Strengthening Work of Three-Revolution Teams
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Strengthening Work of Three-Revolution Teams
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday dedicates an article to the 1st anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Bring About Fresh Turn in Work of Three-Revolution Teams as Required by New Situation".
					 The work published on February 1, Juche 102 (2013) indicates the position and role of three-revolution teams in the ongoing general advance for accelerating the building of an economic power by dint of science and technology and the tasks and ways facing the teams in carrying out the industrial revolution in a new century.
					
					 The publication of the work provided a firm guarantee for thoroughly implementing the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who worked heart and soul to develop the movement of the three-revolution teams and for bringing about a fresh turn in the work of the three-revolution teams, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The movement of the three-revolution teams is a revolutionary guiding method for stepping up the three-revolution, ideological, technological and cultural, by combining the political and ideological guidance with the scientific and technological guidance, making superiors help their subordinates and enlisting the strength of the popular masses.
					
					 It is the consistent strategic line of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) to accelerate the three-revolution.
					
					 Precious successes made in carrying out the three-revolution and building socialism in the past period are linked with the movement of three-revolution teams steadily developed in depth under the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 It is more important to strengthen the work of the three-revolution teams today when the DPRK is raising a fierce wind of making a fresh leap forward on all fronts of the building of a thriving nation true to the New Year Address made by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 When the members of the three-revolution teams educated on the Juche idea, sensitive to the new and strong in enterprising spirit, fulfill their mission and role in every worksite for building an economic power, the WPK's cause of building a thriving nation can make headway.

articles.title: Probe into Truth about IS's Interference in Election Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Probe into Truth about IS's Interference in Election Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The joint action on situation of lay believers of Five Orders in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Jan. 27, according to Voice of People, an internet newspaper of south Korea.
					 The organization dismissed the Intelligence Service's interference in the election as an illegal act from A to Z.
					
					 It called for immediately enforcing a special inspection for the probe into the truth about the case and certainly punishing Lee Myung Bak and others involved in the case.
					
					 It urged the present chief executive to make an apology before the people for the illegal act of the power organ.
					
					 It called on the five orders to pool their efforts and turn out in a powerful action for the realization of their demand.

articles.title: Acquittal of Victim to Fabricated Spying Case Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Acquittal of Victim to Fabricated Spying Case Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The Seoul Central District Court on January 30 declared the acquittal of Korean in Japan Jo Il Ji who was charged with a spy in the 1980s, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The Defense Security Command of the south Korean army arrested him without a warrant in September, 1984 and severely tortured him in order to wrest a false confession that he detected and collected confidential information and reported them to the north after infiltrating in south Korea under the instruction of the north.
					
					 It, in the long run, fabricated the spying case and referred him to the court. The court sentenced him to 7 years in prison.
					
					 The south Korean Committee for Settling the Past History for Truth and Reconciliation probed the truth about the fabricated case in June, 2010.
					
					 The court said that investigators of the Command used power to illegally arrest and detain Jo to be judged by faking up "evidence."
					
					 It also ruled that the "government" should reinstate the victim and his family and make reparations for them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Highly Praised by International Community
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Highly Praised by International Community
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The international community highly praises supreme leader Kim Jong Un devoting his all to the happiness of the people and prosperity of the country.
					 International Link, a magazine of Hong Kong, China, said:
					
					 The world is impressed by the ardent love and reverence of the Korean army and people for Kim Jong Un.
					
					 When he meets soldiers and people, he warmly hugged them, walking with them hands in hands and whispering to each other.
					
					 He boundlessly loves children, patting them on the cheeks and complying with their impertinent requests.
					
					 He has photo sessions with soldiers and people shoulder to shoulder and arms in arms.
					
					 Everyone is fascinated by the personality of him taking warm care of soldiers and people with loving care and sentiments.
					
					 Posted on the website of the Communists Party of Russia is the following article:
					
					 All traits of Kim Jong Un are distinguished but what is most charming among them is his noblest virtues. 
					
					 When Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il passed away unexpectedly the Korean people, overcome with greatest loss and grief, visited the mourning places and stood guards of honor of their own accord in the severe cold.
					
					 Kim Jong Un took urgent measures to arrange places where people could warm themselves and provide hot teas, honeyed water and others at the mourning places and made sure that the convenience of the people participating in the mourning event was put above all.
					
					 As the days and time advance, the world feels more keenly his personality of loving the people.
					
					 The website of the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un's noble loving care for the people would be unthinkable without his transparent outlook on the people.
					
					 He regards the people as most precious being in the world.
					
					 Officials and leader should serve the people. This is his maxim.
					
					 The love for the people is the starting point of his all thinking and activities and this serves as the supreme principle and highest goal of his political activities.
					
					 Great successes have been achieved in the DPRK under the leadership of him devoting his all to the people.
					
					 The secretary general of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of the DR Congo noted:
					
					 Everyone in the DPRK ardently follows and reveres Kim Jong Un, holding him as their real father.
					
					 The leader makes ceaseless field guidance for the happiness of the people and the latter remains loyal to the former.
					
					 Today the DPRK is growing stronger thanks to him and the politics of loving the people pursued by him instills great strength and courage into all the Korean people.
					
					 The Italian broadcasting service Citta Aperta reported:
					
					 The Korean people are filled with great pride and self-confidence of holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as supreme leader of the party, state and army.
					
					 He has devoted his all to the happiness of the Korean people and prosperity of the country by carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is, indeed, the leader of the people and the great father.
					
					 We extend highest glory to Kim Jong Un, a great man of the world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- The full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was posted by the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on its website on January 26.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101(2012), clarifies that holding leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is a principled requirement for victoriously advancing the Korean revolution and indicates the tasks for steadily strengthening the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Crucial Proposal of NDC of DPRK Supported by Russian Organizations
articles.content:
Crucial Proposal of NDC of DPRK Supported by Russian Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Russian organizations expressed full support to the crucial proposal of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 The Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK released a statement on January 27.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 Korean friends in Russia express great concern over the situation on the Korean peninsula just as the world progressive peoples do.
					
					 The NDC of the DPRK recently sent the concrete crucial proposal to the south Korean authorities for improving the north-south relations.
					
					 We fully support the new peace proposal of the DPRK and recognize it as a very timely and constructive proposal.
					
					 We hope that the south Korean authorities would approach it in a responsible and prudent manner and take practical measures for finding out together the way of improving the north-south relations and achieving the independent reunification of the country.
					
					 The Dagestan Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy of Russia said in a statement on January 23 that the above-said proposal is assuming the peace-loving nature and purpose.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 We call upon the south Korean authorities to lend an ear to the initiative of the DPRK. 
					
					 The peace on the Korean peninsula is the desire of all Koreans.
					
					 The DPRK showed its honest-minded will for peaceful dialogue between the north and the south this time, too.
					
					 We demand the south Korean authorities to respond to the proposal of the DPRK.

articles.title: Proposal of NDC of DPRK Supported by Kyrgyzstan Political Figure
articles.content:
Proposal of NDC of DPRK Supported by Kyrgyzstan Political Figure
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party of Kyrgyzstan, issued a statement on January 24 in support of the crucial proposal made by the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 He said:
					
					 The crucial proposal sent by the NDC of the DPRK to the south Korean authorities clearly showed at home and abroad the steadfast will and determination of the Korean people to achieve the independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the country by their concerted efforts.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address stressed the need to firmly adhere to the standpoint of By Our Nation Itself, make a dynamic struggle for defending national security and peace and create the atmosphere for improving the north-south relations.
					
					 The crucial proposal of the NDC of the DPRK is a very just and significant one for carrying out the proposals for national reunification put forward by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					
					 We fully support the crucial proposal and wish the DPRK government and people greater success in their struggle for national reunification.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Egypt
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Egypt
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- An Egyptian national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated on January 26.
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events for praising the career and exploits of Kim Jong Il between January 27 and February 16.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Syria
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Syria
 Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- A Syrian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed on January 23.
					 The director of the Higher Education Department of the Regional Leadership of the Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events for praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia tarjetas de Ano Nuevo a jefes de partido y Estado de varios paises
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia tarjetas de Ano Nuevo a jefes de partido y Estado de varios paises
Pyongyang, 1 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio las tarjetas del Ano Nuevo a los jefes de partido y Estado de diversos paises con motivo del Ano Nuevo 103 (2014) de la Era Juche. 
					Entre los destinatarios figuran el secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y presidente de la Republica Popular China, el presidente de la Federacion Rusa, el de Nepal, el secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, el presidente de la Republica del Libano, el de Mongolia, el emir del Estado de Kuwait, el presidente del Estado de Palestina y del Comite Ejecutivo de la Organizacion de Liberacion Palestina y jefe de la Autoridad Nacional de Palestina, el presidente de la Republica de Tadjikistan, el de Turkmenistan, el de la Republica de Armenia, el rey del Reino Hachemita de Jordania, el presidente de la Republica de Indonesia, el de la Republica de Yemen, el de la Republica Socialista de Vietnam, los regentes de la Republica de San Marino, el presidente de la Republica de Guinea, el de la Republica de Namibia, el de la Republica de Rwanda, el de la Repub lica de Mali, el de la Republica Argelina Democratica y Popular, el de la Republica de Uganda, el de la Republica Arabe de Egipto y el de la Republica Federal Democratica de Etiopia. 
					
					Las tarjetas fueron enviadas igualmente al premier de la Republica de la India, el copresidente de la Fundacion Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il, el secretario general de la ONU y el gobernador del Territorio Litoral de Jabarovsk de Rusia.

articles.title: Cuadros visitan alojamiento de participantes en conferencia nacional de rama agricola
articles.content:
Cuadros visitan alojamiento de participantes en conferencia nacional de rama agricola
Pyongyang, 1 de febrero (ACNC) -- Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Kwak Pom Gi, Ro Tu Chol, los vicepremieres Ri Chol Man y Ri Mu Yong y otros funcionarios visitaron el dia primero el alojamiento de los participantes en la conferencia nacional de los jefes de grupo de la rama agricola. 
					Ellos felicitaron a los funcionarios y los jefes de grupo quienes consolidaron la base material y tecnica de la agricultura, laboraron bien la tierra segun el metodo de cultivo jucheano y contribuyeron asi a aumentar la produccion de cereales. 
					
					Encomendaron a ellos que registren un viraje en la produccion agricola para demostrar bien la justeza y vitalidad de la Tesis sobre el problema rural socialista en este ano del 50o aniversario de publicacion de la misma. 
					
					Les pidieron que conscientes del proposito del partido que fijo la agricultura como rumbo principal en la construccion economica y en la campana para la mejora de la vida del pueblo, apoyen con el aumento de la produccion de cereales la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien hace ingentes esfuerzos mentales y fisicos para resolver el problema alimentario del pueblo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun insiste en realizar el noble proposito de Kim Jong Il por el pueblo
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun insiste en realizar el noble proposito de Kim Jong Il por el pueblo
Pyongyang, 1 de febrero (ACNC) -- En el editorial publicado este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun alaba al Dirigente Kim Jong Il como generoso padre del pueblo quien dedico todo lo suyo por la felicidad del pueblo tomando como su maxima de vida el ideario Iminwichon (considerar al pueblo como el cielo).
					El respeto y amor al pueblo fue el ideal politico y punto de partida de todos sus pensamientos y actividades, adelanta el editorial y continua: 
					
					Con el espiritu de servicio abnegado por el pueblo, el Dirigente estuvo durante toda su vida en el incesante camino de visitas de orientacion para la felicidad del pueblo. 
					
					Fueron preparados por el tanto el inagotable poderio estatal como la vida independiente y creativa del pueblo coreano. 
					
					Sus imborrables proezas garantizan la marcha vigorosa de la nueva centuria del Juche. 
					
					Convertir la patria en el Estado prospero socialista de tipo jucheano fue el deseo de toda la vida del Dirigente. 
					
					Hoy dia, el Partido del Trabajo de Corea orienta lo todo a la materializacion de sus propositos y decisiones.
					
					Cuando todo el pueblo logre saltos sucesivos uniendose compactamente en torno al partido, se realizaran los ideales de toda la vida del Dirigente y la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea brillara como Estado socialista digno y prospero.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a producir nuevo cambio en labor del grupo por tres revoluciones
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a producir nuevo cambio en labor del grupo por tres revoluciones
Pyongyang, 1 de febrero (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun inserto en su edicion de este sabado un articulo individual dedicado al 1o aniversario de publicacion de la obra del Mariscal Kim Jong Un "Registremos un nuevo cambio en la labor del grupo por las tres revoluciones conforme a la exigencia de la realidad en desarrollo".
					 La obra publicada el primero de febrero del 102 (2013) de la Era Juche aclara la posicion que ocupa el grupo por las tres revoluciones en la marcha general de hoy, en que se acelera la construccion de potencia economica con el poderio de la ciencia y tecnica, y su papel, las tareas y los remedios asumidos por el en el cumplimiento de la revolucion industrial del nuevo siglo.
					
					 Gracias a la publicacion del trabajo, se preparo la garantia para materializar cabalmente los legados de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, que prestaban profunda atencion al fortalecimiento y desarrollo del Movimiento del Grupo por las Tres Revoluciones, y para registrar nuevo cambio en la labor arriba mencionada, destaca el articulista y continua:
					
					 Susodicho movimiento es el metodo de direccion revolucionaria de combinar la direccion politico-ideologica con la cientifico-tecnica.
					
					Exige que las unidades superiores ayuden bien a las inferiores y aceleren las tres revoluciones, o sea, la ideologica, la tecnica y la cultural movilizando a las masas populares trabajadoras.
					
					 Acelerar con dinamismo las tres revoluciones es la invariable linea estrategica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					  Los exitos preciosos logrados en el cumplimiento de las tres revoluciones y la construccion socialista en el pasado estan relacionados con ese movimiento desarrollado incesantemente bajo la direccion del PTC.
					
					  Hoy dia en que se levanta una ola de grandes saltos en todos los dominios de la construccion del Estado prospero en pleno acato al mensaje de Ano Nuevo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, cobra mayor importancia la tarea de fortalecer y desarrollar la labor del grupo por las tres revoluciones.
					
					  Cuando los miembros del grupo, sensibles a lo nuevo y con gran espiritu emprendedor que se formaron recibieron la educacion del Juche, desempenen su mision y papel en todas las ramas de construccion de potencia economica, avanzara con vigor la causa de construccion del Estado prospero del PTC.
